db:info.db:title: QNativeInterface Namespace
db:info.db:titleabbrev: Integrating Qt with the native platform

db:abstract.db:para: This namespace was introduced in Qt 6.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: For documentation on how to use these interfaces, see the Native Interfaces overview.

db:warning.db:para: There are no source or binary compatibility guarantees for the native interface APIs, meaning that an application using these interfaces is only guaranteed to work with the Qt version it was developed against.
